guide_explanation_message:
If you are new here, please check  
 “How this menu works” so you can 
 have a pleasant experience at  
 Eleven Madison Park
item_popup_note_placeholder: Add a note [extra sauce, no onions, etc.]
cart_order_placement_override_explanatio: Order will be placed automatically when all the guest of the party has placed their first order. Click “Place Table’s Order” to override automatic order placement
cart_after_order_place_message: You order has been placed. We will start processing when your friends at your party place their order.
cart_table_order_override_confirmation_r: Please confirm to order the whole table order.
